name: Orihime [Sky Flower]
skill: Restores 1981/2361 HP to 2 allies (melee priority). Targets receive 57%/68% less DMG for a limited time.
ability: Sharply increases DMG dealt when Hikoboshi [Sacred Swimsuit] is on the team.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the daughter of the Sky King from the story of Tanabata. She and Hikoboshi were allowed to be together thanks to Amanogawa, and given how inseparable they are, they must be in a state of pure bliss. When she is alone, she's been trying to brush up on her mediocre cooking skills. She's doing survival cooking for a bachelorette, but she's realized it's a little tougher cooking for two.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Coastal Calamity - Tanabata Beach Contest" Event: Get a First Half or Second Half Ranking of 2500 and above.
◦ "Coastal Calamity - Tanabata Beach Contest" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 5000 and above.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Moderately increases the drop rate of Wish Tablet during the "Coastal Calamity - Tanabata Beach Contest" event.
◦ She is also referred to as Vega Lyra

main: "I support the one I love. That is all I can do."
skill: "I give you the power to stand strong."
summon: "I do this for the one I love!"
